description:
instancemonitor collects information about VM's and puts corresponding graphs in S3. It expects to be able to connect to S3 like so:

    s3 = boto.s3.connection.S3Connection(
        aws_access_key_id='admin',
        aws_secret_access_key='admin',
        [...]

This needs to be configurable.
title: Instance monitor uses hardcoded (wrong) crendentials
